page.title: 02GLIDING
page.content: Carlton Bank being 1200 ft above sea-level is ideal for both gliding and hang-gliding. Newcastle & Teesside gliding club have been on Carlton Bank for 20 yrs. They have 20 members, 2 gliders and 1 motor glider with 5 others belonging to syndicates,flying every weekend & all holidays, weather permitting, usually to over 3000ft. The highest achieved was 22000ft (with oxygen). The longest flight was to Doncaster and back. The average flight lasts 5hrs for 50-60 miles. A glider costs Â£800 2nd hand to Â£6000 for a 2 seater. A new glider would cost Â£1200. Depending on the weather, hang-gliders take off into wind from Carlton Bank, Model Ridge & Cringle Moor which face NW,N & NE respectively. Gliding to over 1500ft is achieved depending on thermals & cloud cover, and much higher if the weather is good.
